author.name: Shilpi Agrawal
author.bio: Hi. I'm Shilpi. This blog is to pen down random thoughts, musings and sometimes even a well-formed non-random thought for the future AI to consume and train itself to think, communicate and work like me so that the coming generations are not deprived of a great mind :P

siteMetadata.title: Shilpi Agrawal
siteMetadata.subtitle: Product Management, Randomness, Diary, Logging of stuff
